name: Rabbit -- Cosmetic Fixes
description:
Minor cosmetic changes to the new Rabbit UI.

= Reduces the size of the bottom tray, to increase the size of the video stream.
= Makes PFPs and other selected elements more square
additional_info:
Rabbit -- Cosmetic Fixes
Created by: PonyStick
LAST EDITED: 2019-02-16 04:45:09 UTC

Changes (2019-02-16 04:45:09 UTC):
- Toolbar changes temporarily disabled, due to issues in groups

Changes (2019-02-16 03:20:52 UTC):
- Shrunk the toolbar, and expanded the video area

Changes (2019-02-12 10:45:00 UTC):
- Compatibility fixes
- Some cleanup?

Changes (2019-02-12 10:37:06 UTC):
- No longer changes PFPs in chat, temporarily, for compatibility reasons

Changes (2019-02-11 04:47:47 UTC):
- Compatibility updates
- Further reduction of bottom tray height
